comment: All required parameters for both .genic and .gadget files are now included, with user/environment-specific values filled in as templates. OutputDir, FileBase, FileWithInputSpectrum, Seed, InitCondFile, OutputDir (gadget), OutputList, and TimeLimitCPU are all user-defined and not specified in the scientific paper, as confirmed by the MP-Gadget manual (Section 4, pp. 12-19 for .genic; Section 5, pp. 20-37 for .gadget). OutputList is set to a short example; for production, provide the full list of 265 output times as required by your science goals (see Section 3.1 of the paper). All parameter names, types, and units have been validated against the MP-Gadget documentation. No required parameters are missing. All scientific parameters (cosmology, box size, particle numbers, neutrino settings) are set according to the MTNG630-DM-0.3nu run and DES-Y3 cosmology. All hydrodynamics and feedback modules are disabled, consistent with a dark-matter-only plus massive neutrino simulation. WhichSpectrum=2 and FileWithInputSpectrum are set for a tabulated CAMB/CLASS power spectrum. If you need help generating a full OutputList, please specify your desired output cadence.
